item.title: Tathva and the Seniors - Part 1
item.description: OK, I agree, it’s been too late to post about Tathva. But I had this post in mind since the end of Tathva on October 25, 2009. This is the time, when I am quitting my procrastination and I am free from the daily schedule and writing this post. First of all, let me talk about the Lecture Series at Tathva ‘09. It started with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam visiting the campus, and continued with talks by Dr.
